word_mean: 地方病的：存在于或经常流行于某一群体或地区的疾病或病原因素，另见holoendemic和hyperendemic，参见epidemic

sentence.Network_en: Polio was then endemic among children my age.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时小儿麻痹症在我这个年纪的孩子中很常见。

sentence.Network_en: Street crime is virtually endemic in large cities.
sentence.Network_cn: 街头犯罪近乎是大城市的通病。

sentence.Network_en: Malaria is endemic in many hot countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 疟疾是许多气候炎热国家的流行病。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... demography n 人口统计学 endemic a 本地的；地方性的 epidemic a 流行的；传染性的.
艾滋病英语词汇 ... 问题最为严重 has been hit the hardest 地方病 endemic 低估数据 an underestimate.
有地方性（endemic）和散发性（sporadic）两种。缺碘是地方性甲状腺肿的主要病因。
“特有（endemic）”一词最早由de Candelle于1955年提出，用于描述分布范围有一定限制的生物。目前已知的台湾短翅莺的所有个体 …

list.abs: 地方性氟中毒（endemic fluorosis）是由于一定地区的环境中氟元素过多，而致生活在该环境中的居民经饮水、食物和空气等途径长期 …
地方性克汀病（Endemic Cretinism）是严重碘缺乏病的表现，是胚胎期和出生后早期碘缺乏和甲状腺功能低下所造成的大脑与中枢神 …
endemic goiter 地方性甲状腺肿endemic species 当地种endive 苦苣
地方性甲状腺肿(endemic goiter)是甲状腺肿的一种。甲状腺肿按地区分布可分为地方性和散发性两种。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (as a noun): from French endémique or modern Latin endemicus, from Greek endēmios 'native' (based on dēmos 'people')

entry.def: If a disease or illness is endemic in a place, it is frequently found among the people who live there.

example.ex: Polio was then endemic among children my age.
example.tran: 那时小儿麻痹症在我这个年纪的孩子中很常见。

entry.def: If you say that a condition or problem is endemic, you mean that it is very common and strong, and cannot be dealt with easily.

example.ex: Street crime is virtually endemic in large cities.
example.tran: 街头犯罪近乎是大城市的通病。

example.ex: ...powerful radicals with an endemic hatred and fear of the West.
example.tran: 普遍仇恨又惧怕西方世界的势力强大的激进分子

means.word_mean: 1. a disease that is constantly present to a greater or lesser degree in people of a certain class or in people living in a particular location
2. a plant that is native to a certain limited area;

sentences.sentence: "it is an endemic found only this island"

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a disease (or anything resembling a disease) constantly present to greater or lesser extent in a particular locality;

sentences.sentence: "food shortages and starvation are endemic in certain parts of the world"

means.word_mean: 2. native to or confined to a certain region;

sentences.sentence: "the islands have a number of interesting endemic species"
"the autochthonal fauna of Australia includes the kangaroo"
"the Ainu are indigenous to the northernmost islands of Japan"

auth_sentence.content: Barbarism and political savagery are endemic in human affairs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Barbarism and political savagery are endemic in human affairs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Barbarism and political savagery are endemic in human affairs.

auth_sentence.content: Corruption is rife and unemployment and illiteracy are endemic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Corruption is rife and unemployment and illiteracy are endemic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Corruption is rife and unemployment and illiteracy are endemic.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en进入+compass范围→v.包围,围绕
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

stems_affixes.type_exp: =people 表示"人民,人们" demo- popul-

stems_affixes.word_buile: en在……内+dem人民+ic……的→在人民之中→地方性的
epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
pan广泛的+dem人民+ic……的→人民广泛[染病]→广为流行的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 蛊惑民心的策略和手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: dem人民,人们+agog引导,蛊惑+y→n.蛊惑民心的策略和手段

means.word_mean: 某地特有的;(尤指疾病)地方性的, 流行的, 难摆脱的

sentences.en: attempts to rescue the country from endemic violence
sentences.cn: 为救国家脱离暴力泛滥的多番努力

sentences.en: He said that racism is endemic in this country.
sentences.cn: 他说种族主义在该国很普遍。

sentences.en: The chest disease is endemic among miners in this area.
sentences.cn: 这种胸部疾病是流行于本地区矿工中的地方病。
